SELECT BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.VESSEL_YOSAN_ID, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.YEAR, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.YOSAN_HEAD_ID, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.MS_VESSEL_ID, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.RENEW_DATE, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.RENEW_USER_ID, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.TS
FROM BG_VESSEL_YOSAN
WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.VESSEL_YOSAN_ID, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.YEAR, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.YOSAN_HEAD_ID, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.MS_VESSEL_ID, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.RENEW_DATE, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.RENEW_USER_ID, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.TS
FROM BG_VESSEL_YOSAN
WHERE BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID
AND BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.YEAR = :YEAR AND BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.YOSAN_HEAD_ID = :YOSAN_HEAD_ID AND BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID

SELECT BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.VESSEL_YOSAN_ID, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.YEAR, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.YOSAN_HEAD_ID, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.MS_VESSEL_ID, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.RENEW_DATE, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.RENEW_USER_ID, BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.TS
FROM BG_VESSEL_YOSAN WHERE BG_VESSEL_YOSAN.VESSEL_YOSAN_ID = :VESSEL_YOSAN_ID

INSERT INTO BG_VESSEL_YOSAN ( VESSEL_YOSAN_ID, YEAR, YOSAN_HEAD_ID, MS_VESSEL_ID, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES ( nextval('SEQ_BG_VESSEL_YOSAN_ID'), :YEAR, :YOSAN_HEAD_ID, :MS_VESSEL_ID, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE BG_VESSEL_YOSAN SET YEAR = :YEAR, YOSAN_HEAD_ID = :YOSAN_HEAD_ID, MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID
WHERE (VESSEL_YOSAN_ID = :VESSEL_YOSAN_ID) AND (TS = :TS)
